Name: Coptic textile
Description: An oval medallion of woollen tapestry on a linen background. The motif is an elaborate plant in red, green and brown, arranged around a central cruciform pattern in yellow within a circle of deep purple. There is an inner border of red and green with an outer geometric border framing the whole. Colours include red, green, orange, indigo, purple and yellow.Technique: tapestry with built up shapes, slits and curved weft.Ends per inch (warp threads): 24.Picks per inch (weft threads): 120 approximately.
